verified.title: Email is Verified !
verified.description: Thank you ! You can now fully participate with the community !

confirmed.title: Password has been reset !
confirmed.description: You can now login with your new password

signup.title: Let's get you in!
signup.description: Already have an account ? <link> Login instead </link>
signup.tos: I accept the <terms>Terms of Use</terms> & <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>

emailSent.title: Email has been sent
emailSent.description: To verify your account, please click on the link received by email

recovery.title: Forgot your password ?
recovery.description: Enter your email to get a reset link

emailSent.title: Email has been sent
emailSent.description: If your email exist, use the link you received by email to recover your password
emailSent.resend: Haven't receive the email ? {timer, plural, =0 {<interaction>resent</interaction>} =1 {<interaction>resend in # second</interaction>} other {<interaction>resend in # seconds</interaction>}}

signin.title: Welcome back!
signin.description: Do not have an account yet? <link> Create an account </link>

hero.title: Discover your ideal workplace <important>Anytime, Anywhere</important>
hero.description: Discover prime locations with fast Wi-Fi, cozy vibes, and all the essentials for digital nomads, freelancers, or anyone looking for a refreshing workspace.

feature.title: Tailor Your Remote Work Experience
feature.description: Work is no longer tied to a specific place, we help you find your next favorite place to enhance your productivity. Find locations that resonate with your work style and preferences.

explore.title: Explore
explore.description: Whether you're in your hometown or halfway across the globe, we connects you to local workspaces with global standards.

search.title: Search
search.description: Every remote worker has unique needs. We provides detailed information on noise levels, comfort, and facilities, so you can choose a spot that feels right for you.

collaborate.title: Collaborate
collaborate.description: Engage with a community of like-minded remote workers. Share tips, find collaborative spaces, and exchange information on the best working spots in town.

place.title: Latest places added
place.description: Explore the latest spots added by fellow remote workers like you

editor.title: Add a new Place
editor.description: Search a place by name using the input below, then provide information on the place. Please try to be accurate about it

viewer.refineYourSearch: Please change your filters or map location

notfound.title: You have found a secret place.
notfound.description: Unfortunately, this is only a 404 page. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL.
notfound.return: Take me back to home page

generic.restrictedToVerifiedUser: Create and verify your account before adding a place
